\documentclass[$if(anonymous)$peereviewca$else$conference$endif$,10pt]{IEEEtran}

$endif$

\newtheorem{definition}[theorem]{Definition}
\newtheorem{remark}[theorem]{Remark}
\newtheorem{example}[theorem]{Example}

  $endif$
  $endif$
}

}

  $for(it.affiliation)$

  $sep$ \\
  $endfor$
  Email: $it.email$
  }
  $sep$ \and
  $endfor$
}
$endif$
